title: Project Vena Cava [game trailer]
brief_description: ‘Project Vena Cava’ is an ambitious atmospheric first-person shooter with dark cinematic elements. Its storyline is science fiction themed and is delivered primarily through written documents found throughout the game, as well as a voiceover that accompanies the player throughout. It is similar in style to other sci-fi first-person shooters such as ‘Halo’, ‘Metroid Prime’ and ‘Portal’.
